title: TIE/ht Hunter
wikitext:
[[File:TIE-ht-Hunter.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''TIE/ht Tie Hunter'''
'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems Tie/ht
'''Affiliation''': Empire
'''Source''': unknown
'''Type''': Hunter starfighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 6.9 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter piloting: Tie /ht
'''Crew Skill''': Starfighter piloting 5D+1, starship gunnery 5D
'''Cargo Capacity''': 35 kilograms
'''Consumables''': 2 days
'''Hyperdrive Multiplier''': x2
'''Hyperdrive Backup''': No
'''Maneuverability''': 3D
'''Space''': 10 ( Wings open ); 12 ( Wings Closed and weapons deactivated )
'''Atmosphere''': 415, 1,200 km/h
'''Hull''': 1D
'''Shilds''': 2D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 25/1D *Scan: 40/2D *Search: 60/3D *Focus: 4/2D+2 '''Weapons''': *2 Medium Laser Cannons ( firelinked ) : Fire Arc: front
Skill: starship gunnery
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 5D *Twin Ion Cannons ( firelinked ) : Fire Arc: front
Skill: starship gunnery
Fire Control: 3D
Space Range: 1-3/7/36
Atmosphere Range: 100-300m/700m/3,6 km
Damage: 4D *Proton Torpedo Launcher : Fire Arc: front
Skill: starship gunnery
Fire Control: 3D+2
Space Range: 1/4/7
Atmosphere Range: 50-100m/300m/700m
Damage: 9D '''Capsule''': *(1) The Tie Hunter has x foils similar to the X-Wing starfighter, allowing it a higher Speed when the wings are closed and the weapons deactivated.
This series has a limited product quantity during the Galactical Civil war, because of the arrogance most imperial Leaders has shown to use enemy Technology designs.
